item.title: 英国通胀率在 2 月份有所放缓，这使得英格兰银行有望在未来几个月内开始降息，并在预计今年晚些时候举行的大选之前为首相苏纳克提供了一些更好的经济消息
item.description:
British inflation slowed in February, keeping the Bank of England on track to start cutting interest rates in the months ahead and offering some better economic news to Prime Minister Rishi Sunak before an election expected later this year https://t.co/gyUCae1CPJ pic.twitter.com/hWbmMlX3Lw

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 20, 2024

item.title: 看华尔街周二收盘走高，英伟达（Nvidia）股价走出红盘，收盘上涨1%，原因是该公司披露了其备受期待的Blackwell B200人工智能芯片的定价和出货计划。
item.description:
WATCH: Wall Street ended higher on Tuesday as shares in Nvidia pulled out of the red to close up 1% after it revealed pricing and shipment plans for its hotly anticipated Blackwell B200 artificial intelligence chip https://t.co/7bvnJEN9Gn pic.twitter.com/TzcRbEOSQP

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 20, 2024

item.title: 观看：从英伟达（Nvidia）发布新旗舰芯片后的业绩下滑，到人工智能热潮如何冲击加密货币市场，我们盘点了本周人工智能革命的重大事件
item.description:
WATCH: From Nvidia's slump after unveiling a new flagship chip to how the AI boom has hit crypto markets, we round up the week's big stories from the AI revolution pic.twitter.com/fSemknxnOB

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 20, 2024

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：有媒体报道称，苹果公司正在与 Alphabet 谈判，希望将谷歌母公司的人工智能模型引入其设备中。@AnitaRamaswamy 认为，双方围绕谷歌搜索的现有合作关系意味着，如果不达成协议，双方都会有损失。
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: Apple is in talks with Alphabet to bring the Google parent's AI models to its devices, a media report said. Their existing tie-up around Google search means both have something to lose if they don’t ink a deal, argues @AnitaRamaswamy https://t.co/qFclMt7LZk pic.twitter.com/BpwfdpBO6I

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 20, 2024

item.title: 观看：熟悉内情的人士透露，诺德斯特龙（Nordstrom）背后的创始家族正在寻求将这家美国百货公司私有化，六年前，他们曾试图将其私有化，但未能成功。
item.description:
WATCH: The founding family behind Nordstrom is seeking to take the US department store operator private, six years after a similar attempt proved unsuccessful, people familiar with the matter said https://t.co/NspcUSWnDX pic.twitter.com/BJO1oQFyJh

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 20, 2024
